about_the_game: The Residential Crusaders Demo allows players to experience the first full day of the game, Monday. During Monday, you will play as a person who is swept up into fighting crime and becoming a vigilante. The demo includes a basic tutorial, dialog, a couple of street fights, and the first boss of the game. The full game takes place within a week and expands upon the what you will see from the demo.

content_descriptors.notes: Mild fantasy violence, blood, and profanity.
